summary: The diff addresses all four requirements. REQ-17 and REQ-18 are handled by rewriting ChatSection.tsx to use useGetChatMessages(ticketId) and useSendMessageForTicket. REQ-19 is handled by removing payment gate logic from ClientPortal.tsx and TicketCreationForm.tsx. REQ-20 is addressed in backend/main.mo though the diff is truncated limiting full verification. The TicketCreationForm collects title/description/priority but the mutationFn only passes techPrincipal to createSupportTicket, potentially disconnecting form fields from the actual backend call.

missing_requirements.requirement: Submitting the ticket creation form successfully creates a ticket in the backend with the user-entered title, description, and priority.
missing_requirements.reason: In TicketCreationForm.tsx, the mutation calls actor.createSupportTicket(techPrincipal) without passing the collected title, description, or priority fields, meaning user-entered form data is not submitted to the backend.

hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any requirement to mark ticket messages as read. This feature was added without being requested.
